title: Belle and Valentine
description: His hands and mouth make her body sing, but can she trust him?  Forced to return to her hometown after the death of her cheating husband, Zuria Belle has hit rock bottom. She’s hurt and humiliated, but she has hopes of starting over working in her brother’s coffee shop. Unfortunately, she forgot just how hot and dangerous her brother’s partner and best friend is.  Fane Valentine cruises around town on his motorcycle with one mission—to bed every woman in North Carolina, and Zuria’s next on his list. She vowed not to fall for the sexy bad boy. After all, she’s been burned before. Fane’s silver tongue and skilled hands set her on fire. The question is, can Zuria give him her body while safeguarding her heart?
author: Tressie Lockwood
